text: Punsalmaagiin Ochirbat (; January 23, 1942 - January 17, 2025) was a Mongolian politician. He was the first President of Mongolia from 1990 to 1997. Ochirbat died on 17 January 2025 in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Presidents of Mongolia
title: Punsalmaagiin Ochirbat
